snippet.title: JOHNNY DEPP's Former Bodyguard Revealed Shocking Things About AMBER HEARD
snippet.description:
JOHNNY DEPP's Former Bodyguard Revealed Shocking Things About AMBER HEARD
______________________________________________
For more videos subscribe : https://bit.ly/2zoPgqj
______________________________________________
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard's bodyguard has revealed what really happened during the former couple's ill-fated trip to Australia, claiming the Hollywood heavyweight was never aggressive towards his ex-wife.
 
Rick Wood was head of security at the Gold Coast mansion where the couple stayed in 2015 while the actor was filming Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales. Mr Wood claims he never thought 57-year-old Depp was capable of the abuse he has been accused of.

'I couldn't see it in him. In my industry, you know who's a wife beater and who's not.' the security guard told 9News. 
 
In fact, Mr Wood said Depp displayed great patience with his wife, who he described as a 'button pusher'. 'I hate to say it, but she stirs the pot,' Mr Wood revealed.

He recalled Heard pretending to pack her bags and insisting that she would leave the property when the couple got into arguments.

'She made up this big drama that she was leaving... Taxis would turn up and we'd have to turn them away,' Mr Wood said. 'And then we'd pick up the suitcases and they were empty. Nothing in them at all. It was all for drama.'

Depp would stay calm during these encounters, Mr Wood said, and would eventually coax Heard back into the home. Mr Wood said he never saw Depp taking drugs or drinking copious amounts of alcohol during his time in Australia.

Their stay in Australia has been rehashed during court proceedings in London, where Depp is suing The Sun newspaper over a 2018 story labelling him a 'wife beater' during his five-year relationship with Heard.

Johnny Depp’s security officer Sean Bett had also alleged that actress Amber Heard physically abused Depp during their marriage. in his witness statement, which was presented to the court, Bett said he headed to the couple's home in Los Angeles on the night of Heard's 30th birthday party on April 21 2016. He said Depp was "sober, lucid" and added the actor had "expressed his concern to us about how Ms Heard might behave, the situation before it escalated further,” he said.

He stated: "She did not call me or fellow security guard Mr Judge and the only reason why we entered the Penthouse 3 was because we had heard these screams.

"When we entered, we saw Mr Depp standing approximately 20 feet away from Ms Heard, who was standing by the couch.

"As soon as Ms Heard noticed that we had entered the room, she looked very surprised; her demeanour then changed and she pointed at Mr Depp and screamed to us words to the effect of: 'If he hits me one more time, I am calling the police.'

Mr Bett went on to say: “I have quite good eyesight. I was able to see that Ms Heard was wearing little or no make-up, her skin was quite pale and she had no red marks or evidence of any bruises or abrasions to her face or body.

“I could see Mr Depp was visibly upset at having been accused of hitting Ms Heard. However, he never came closer than 20 feet to her during the time I was able to observe them.

“I did not notice any smashed glass or broken bottles in the apartment at the time.”

Mr Bett claimed he, Mr Depp and Mr Judge agreed that the actor should leave the building “due to the fact that the situation had escalated and Ms Heard was hysterically shouting at Mr Depp and making allegations about his behaviour”.

It pretty surprising Judge couldn’t see these things, which clearly shows that Amber Heard was the abuser. Let us know what you guys think, in the comments section below and don’t forget to like this video before leaving. Thanks for watching!
